description: Installation of 10 panels for the display of public art from 01/06/2022.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans 

CSTUPA - FCB - ZZ - XX - D - A - 0751: Camley Street Underpass public art cover letter LONL3040; Technical Construction Details (Network Rail build Hollywood spec[92]); CSTUPA - FCB - ZZ - XX - D - A - 0010; CSTUPA - FCB - ZZ - XX - D - A - 0701

Reason:
For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
Condition : 3 - All new external work shall be carried out in materials that resemble, as closely as possible, in colour and texture those of the existing building, unless otherwise specified in the approved application. 

Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policy D1 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017. 
Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (Control of advertisements) Regulations 2007 (or any regulations revoking and re-enacting those regulations with or without modification) the panels shall only be used for display of art and no advertisements shall be displayed on the panels or erected without the prior written permission of the local planning authority. 

Reason: To safeguard the visual amenity of the area, and prevent corporate advertising to ensure that the external appearance of the bridge is satisfactory in accordance with policies G1, D1, D4 and A1 of the Camden Local Plan 2017.
